name: 28 HH
description:
It's your best friend birthday! Unfortunately, you are just a Witch and don't have a clue on how to make a cake... So you decide to go out and find one for him!

Features colorblind accessibility y traducción al español!

Controls:

Arrow keys , WASD for movement

Space, Enter for select/interact

Esc changes language

Colorblind modes can be toggled at the start on config

Everything  by me. 

For J.

Tkm, feliz cumpleaños.

Also did a Zine about it.

https://virago-k.itch.io/28-hh-zine
